DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate influence personality profile patient MOH evaluate effect custom-made educational programme add-on standard treatment compare standard treatment alone MOH patient use randomize control trial ( RCT ) design .
DOC.brief_title: Medication-overuse Headache : The Effect Patient Educational Programme add-on Standard Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Worldwide , two percent population suffers medication-overuse headache ( MOH ) , paradox condition headache cause overuse headache medication . Common treatment withdrawal , consensus constitute best treatment . The study consist RCT MOH patient randomized standard treatment versus standard treatment + 12-week , 6-session educational programme add-on . The programme base theory motivational interviewing , patient choose individualized education education group . Primary endpoint : Headache frequency measure self-reported headache diary number day headache pre-vious month . Secondary endpoint : NEO-FFI-3 personality test , cop strategy , pain intensity , bothersomeness , patient satis-faction report medication intake .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed medicationoveruse headache ( MOH ) neurologist ( The International Classification headache Disorders ) . Completed withdrawal ( hospitalized 8 day home ) . Age 1865 year Understand speak Danish Comorbidity ( e.g . whiplash , rheumatism need analgesic treatment Mental health disorder
